Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it's equally valuable to someone like you who can truly appreciate its worth. We're offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $14,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know promptly. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
